remarks: The polarity of the whole projective subspace is the empty space. Remark in [Holland95] p. 223.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
polssat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
polssat.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
pol1N $p |- ( K e. HL -> ( ._|_ ` A ) = (/) ) $.
